adDetails: PACKING*UNPACKING*ORGANIZING Were professionally licensed packers in the Bay Area. We will completely pack and preparing everything in your home for your move. Or, triple wrapping, which includes: paper padding, corregating and shrink wrapping. All of our packing is done with sensitive pressure tape, which is resistant to moisture and humidity.
